description: Submission details for the discharge of Condition 8 (Landscape Species) and 9 (Landscaping Details) in relation to the construction site comprising the southern blocks (Blocks E and F only) of Plot 13 as illustrated on the 'Brent Cross Town Plot 13 Planning Demise Areas' submission document of Reserved Matters Approval reference 18/6337/RMA dated 18/03/2019 (as amended by 20/1209/NMA, 20/5693/NMA, 21/5982/NMA, 23/0621/NMA and 23/5027/NMA) within the Phase 1C sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
